message: Passing forward UI/UX decisions to users is never a good idea. And here is why: https://medium.com/what-i-learned-building/8459f3801bb3 - Do you agree?

data.message:
الزبون: أنا عايز أرز وشوربة ولحمة
المضيف: هتاكل مكرونة وفراخ
الزبون: بأقوللك أنا عايز.....
المضيف: أنا قلتلك هتطفح مكرونة وفراخ (ويدي الزبون علي قفاه)

what the article wanna say is that giving a lot of options to the user is a devil and normally they won't use your app. a good example is your App of how many person fit here. it's in the point and doesn't have a lot of options and the user won't get lost. 

a useless option would be making the person register or use his facebook/twitter to access the app.
